resources.string:
•Overall improvement in mood 
 •Increased self-confidence 
 •Increased sociability 
 •Decreased Anxiety 
 •Shortened attention span 
 •Flushed appearance 
 •Impaired judgement 
 •Impaired fine muscle coordination

•Sedation 
 •Impaired memory and comprehension 
 •Delayed reactions 
 •Disorientation; difficulty walking/balancing 
 •Partially blurred vision 
 •Mild impairment to other senses

•Extreme confusion 
 •Vomiting 
 •Numbness; reduced sense of pain 
 •Heightened disorientation/dizziness; staggering 
 •Trouble speaking 
 •Heavily impaired senses

•Loss of consciousness 
 •Extreme disorientation; loss of muscle control 
 •Vomiting; possible death by pulmonary aspiration 
 •Severe memory loss 
 •Trouble breathing (hypoventilation) 
 •Decreased heart rate 
 •Urinary incontinence

•Coma 
 •Severely weakened reflexes 
 •Life-threatening respiratory depression 
 •Very slow heart rate 
 •Death

This app is for entertainment purposes only.

 It gives you a rough estimate of your blood alcohol content and it is not meant to be used as legal advice, or as an indication of your ability to drive or work.

 DO NOT DRINK AND DRIVE.
